        public static <A,B,C> IgniteCurriedBiFunction<A,B,C> curry(IgniteBiFunction<A,B,C> f)

        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of first argument of function to be transformed.
        B - Type of second argument of function to be transformed.
        C - Type of third argument of function to be transformed.
        Parameters:
        f - Function to be curried.
        Returns:
        Curried bi-function.

        Returns:
